name: Crashy Dashy Cars
description:
Tap to change your lane otherwise you will crash!


See how far you can go ? how big score you can make ? This is super addictive and challenging game ever!!

Share you score with your friends, Challenge them and see what they have got!!

- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Play anywhere and share and challenge your friends!

Download Today to enjoy best tricky test driving game!

Please rate us and write a review to share your thoughts and love, tell us how we can improve our games for you! we would love to hear from you!

Thanks
